name: Skibidi Elephant Rizzler
imagePrompt: A cute Liozephant hybrid, 3D render, vibrant colors, in a cyber-jungle background. It has a lion's mane, zebra stripes on its trunk, and elephant-like tusks.

hotspots.note: This majestic mane helps attract zebras!
Striped trunk for extra camouflage in the savanna.
Ivory tusks with black stripes, good for digging up delicious roots.

fact: Elephants can communicate through vibrations in the ground that they feel in their feet!

name: Ohio Penguin Tax
imagePrompt: A cute Penguincodile hybrid, 3D render, vibrant colors, in a cyber-jungle background. It waddles on short penguin legs, has crocodile scales, and parrot feathers on its head.

Colorful feathers help the Penguincodile blend into the jungle's foliage.

fact: Parrots can mimic human speech because their brains have a structure similar to ours!

name: Sigma Long-Neck Monkephant

fact: A giraffe's spots are like human fingerprints - no two giraffes have the same pattern!
